original_text: Even Elizabeth your relative is going to have a child in her old age, and she who was said to be unable to conceive is in her sixth month.
korean_text: 보라 네 친족 엘리사벳도 늙어서 아들을 배었느니라 본래 임신하지 못한다고 알려진 이가 이미 여섯 달이 되었나니

sentences.original_text: is going to have a child
and she who was said to be unable to conceive
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 임신할 수 없다고 말해졌던 그녀는
